div.p: One day, three tracks, more fun than a barrel of elePHPants!

Join us for a one day, three-track conference that focuses on PHP and related web technologies. This event is organized by Madison PHP and is designed to offer something to attendees at all skill levels. It will be a day of networking, learning, sharing, and great fun!
We've carefully crafted three distinct tracks but you're not locked into just one. Attend any talk from any track.
Learn the basics of PHP development. A carefully selected set of talks for those who have never programmed before or who are new to PHP and would like a refresher of the basics.
Explore new technologies and techniques. Gather with other seasoned developers and increase your value with a series of talks that will both energize and get you excited about the future of PHP.
